resources.string: Help Colita to explode bubbles and get candies!!
Touch empty bubbles to explode them!!
You can move any bubble to the right or left!!
Match filled bubbles to pop them away!!

string-array.name: colita_talking_happy
string-array.item: Nice One!!
That was great!!
Your are good with this!!

string-array.name: colita_talking_unhappy
string-array.item: EKKS! I do not like fish!
I do not like me pull the hair!
WTF!!

string-array.name: colita_talking_levelup
string-array.item: You are half way to level up!
You are almost leveling up!
Great! Level up is comming now!

string-array.name: colita_talking_normal
string-array.item: Do you know that I\'m cat friendly?
By the way, I have black pads
Certainly I have strawberry bubblegum tongue
I like to sleep with humans
I want more sugar!
Will you take me to the park?
I love shopping
Poppy was my boyfriend, it did not work ...
I am a vegan dog
Water is wet, I do not like the shower
My humans are poor, they live in rented
I like to run through the grass of the park
Pistacho is really a mystery
